externalDocs.description: Find out more about Deel APIs.

tags.name: Contractors
tags.description: The Contracts resource lets you create, amend and, retrieve Deel contracts.

tags.name: Contracts
tags.description: The Contracts resource lets you create, amend and, retrieve Deel contracts.

tags.name: Hris
tags.description: API end-points related to HRIS data.

tags.name: Invoices
tags.description: The Invoices resource lets you create, amend and retrieve invoices related to Deel contracts.

tags.name: Legal Entities
tags.description: The Legal Entities resource lets you manage your legal entities

tags.name: Lookups
tags.description: Helper end-points for choosing options for other operations

tags.name: Milestones
tags.description: Helper end-points for managing milestones of Deel contracts

tags.name: Off-cycle Payments
tags.description: End-points to manage off-cycle payments for a given contract

tags.name: Organizations
tags.description: Helper end-points for additional information about your organizations

tags.name: Accounting
tags.description: End-points to retrieve paid invoices and reciepts.

tags.name: Tasks
tags.description: End-points to manage tasks for a given contract

tags.name: Teams
tags.description: Helper end-points for additional information about your teams

tags.name: Timesheets
tags.description: The Invoices resource lets you create, amend and retrieve timesheets of Deel contracts.

post.summary: Create a new Hris direct employee

get.description: Retrieve the hiring guide data for a country. This data can be used to create Employee of Record (EOR) contract quotes.

post.description: Create an Employee of Record (EOR) contract quote. The endpoints creates a contract quote request. Deel will process the information and get back with a quote for this contract.

get.description: Retrieve a list of contracts.

post.description: Create a new Deel contract.

get.description: Retrieve a single contract.

patch.description: Add an external Id to a Deel contract. You can use this to add a Deel contract's refernece Id in your platform. External Id can be passed as a query parameter in List contract endpoint to find this conract later.

post.description: Attach document to a contract. You can only add one document at a time. If you need to attach more documents please attach a Zip file.

put.summary: Edit the file attached to contract document.
put.description: Overwrite the file currently attached to contract document.

get.description: Retrieve an IC contract agreement content in HTML. If no template is specified, the default or currently assigned template will be used. This endpoint does not support EOR and Global Payroll contract types.
Retrieve a list of tasks for a given contract.

post.description: Create a new task for the contractor.

get.description: Returns an array of alternate email objects

post.description: Review multiple tasks to approve or decline the submitted work.
Review a single task to approve or decline the submitted work.
Amend payment details of a contract.
Terminate an active contract.
Sign a contract as a client.

patch.description: Archive a terminated, cancelled or completed contract.

post.description: Invite a worker to sign the contract. Worker will be notified via email.

delete.description: Remove invite in order to re-invite a worker to sign the contract.

get.description: Retrieve a list of timesheets found for a contract.
Retrieve a list of milestones found for a contract.

post.description: Add a new milestone to contract.

get.description: Retrieve a single milestone.

delete.description: Delete a single milestone from a contract.

post.description: Review a milestone to approve or decline submitted work.
Review a batch of milestones to approve or reject submitted work.

get.description: Retrieve a list of off-cycle payments for the given contract id.

post.description: Add a new invoice line-item for the purpose of off-cycle payment for a given contract.

get.description: Retrieve a single off-cycle payment.

post.description: Add additional protection against misclassification by upgrading to Deel Premium.

delete.description: Remove Deel Premium from an existing contract.

get.description: Calculate the final payment due to the contractor when ending the contract.

post.description: First payment is calculated from the number of working/calendar days between their start date and the start of the payment cycle.

get.description: Retrieve the list of time off requests by an employee.

post.description: Add a time off request for a full-time employee.

put.description: Edit a time off request for a full-time employee.

delete.description: Cancel a time off request for an employee.

get.description: Retrieve a list of timesheets in your Deel account. You can filter the list by providing additional paramters e.g. contract_id, contract_type etc.

post.description: Submit work for a contractor.

get.description: Retrieve a single timesheet entry by Id.

post.description: Review a timesheet to approve or decline submitted work.
Review a batch of timesheets to approve or reject submitted work.

get.description: Retrieve a list of invoice details for the given contract id.
Retrieve a list of invoice details. You can filter the list by providing additional paramters e.g. contract_id, contract_type etc.

post.description: Create an invoice adjustment using this endpoint. For example, you can add a bonus, commission, VAT %, deduction etc. to an invoice.

patch.description: Update an existing invoice adjustment. It is not possible to update VAT adjustments, we recommend you to delete the existing VAT adjust and create a new one.

post.description: Review an invoice adjustment to approve or decline it.
Review multiple invoice adjustments to approve or decline a batch.

get.description: Retrieve a list of legal entities in your account.
Retrieve a list of countries supported by Deel.
Retrieve the list of currencies used by Deel.
Retrieve a list of pre-defined job titles in Deel platform.
Retrieve a list of pre-defined seniority level for roles in Deel platform.
Retrieve a list of pre-defined time off types to register in Deel platform.
Retrieve the current organization details. Organization is automatically detected from the auth token.
Retrieve a list of teams in your organization.

post.description: Upload file to Deel storage to use the file attachment feature for other endpoints.

get.description: This end-point returns a list of your agreements with Deel.
Retrieve a list of contract templates in your organization.
Retrieve a list of time off entitlements for a full-time employee.
List of time offs for all employees in your organization.

patch.description: Approve or decline an employee's time off request.

get.description: Retrieve a list of paid invoices for your workforce.
Get link to download the invoice PDF.
Get a link to download the Deel billing invoice PDF.
Retrieve a list of payments made to Deel.
Retrieve a list of webhook subscriptions.

post.description: Create a new webhooks subscription.

get.description: Retrieve a single webhook subscription.
Get a full breakdown of a payment made to Deel. Breakdown will include individual invoices and Deel fee as line items.

ParamContractTemplateIdInQuery.name: templateId
ParamContractTemplateIdInQuery.description: ID of an existing contract template.

ParamAfterCursor.name: after_cursor
ParamAfterCursor.description: Return next page of results after given cursor.

ParamLimit.name: limit
ParamLimit.description: Return a page of results with given number of records.

ParamPeopleLimit.name: limit
ParamPeopleLimit.description: Return a page of results with given number of records.

ParamPeopleOffset.name: offset
ParamPeopleOffset.description: Return a page of results with given number of records.

ParamSortDir.name: order_direction
ParamSortDir.description: Order direction of results; ascending or descending.

ParamContractsTeamId.name: team_id
ParamContractsTeamId.description: Filter contracts for given team ID; NOTE: technically ALL query parameters are strings or array of strings

ParamContractsExternalId.name: external_id
ParamContractsExternalId.description: Filter contracts for given external ID

ParamContractsSearchTerm.name: search
ParamContractsSearchTerm.description: Include a contract if by name or contractor name contains given search term.

ParamContractsTypeList.name: types
ParamContractsTypeList.description: You can filter contracts by type, a contract is included in results if its type is in this list.

ParamContractsStatusList.name: statuses
ParamContractsStatusList.description: You can filter contracts by current status, a contract is included in results if its status is in this list.

ParamContractsCountryCodeList.name: countries
ParamContractsCountryCodeList.description: Country codes of contracts to filter.

ParamContractsCurrencyCodeList.name: currencies
ParamContractsCurrencyCodeList.description: Currency codes of contracts to filter.

ParamContractsSortBy.name: sort_by
ParamContractsSortBy.description: Sort contracts by given field name.

ParamTimesheetsReporterId.name: reporter_id
ParamTimesheetsReporterId.description: ID of an existing profile; NOTE: technically ALL query parameters are strings or array of strings

ParamDateFrom.name: date_from
ParamDateFrom.description: Filtered results will include records created on or after the provided date.

ParamDateTo.name: date_to
ParamDateTo.description: Filtered results will include records created before the provided date.

ParamIssuedDateFrom.name: issued_from_date
ParamIssuedDateFrom.description: to get records created after given issue date

ParamIssuedDateTo.name: issued_to_date
ParamIssuedDateTo.description: to get records created before given issued date

ParamTimesheetsLimit.name: limit
ParamTimesheetsLimit.description: Return a page of results with given number of records; NOTE: technically ALL query parameters are strings or array of strings

ParamTimesheetsOffset.name: offset
ParamTimesheetsOffset.description: Return a page of results after given index of row

ParamTimesheetDeletionReason.name: reason
ParamTimesheetDeletionReason.description: Reason for deleting an existing timesheet

ParamTaskDeletionReason.name: reason
ParamTaskDeletionReason.description: Reason for deleting an existing task

ParamInvoiceAdjustmentsReporterId.name: reporter_id
ParamInvoiceAdjustmentsReporterId.description: ID of an existing profile; NOTE: technically ALL query parameters are strings or array of strings

ParamInvoiceAdjustmentsInvoiceId.name: invoice_id
ParamInvoiceAdjustmentsInvoiceId.description: ID of an existing invoice; NOTE: technically ALL query parameters are strings or array of strings

ParamInvoiceAdjustmentsTypeList.name: types
ParamInvoiceAdjustmentsTypeList.description: types of invoice adjustments to filter

ParamInvoiceAdjustmentsStatusList.name: statuses
ParamInvoiceAdjustmentsStatusList.description: statuses of invoice adjustment to filter

ParamInvoiceAdjustmentsDateFrom.name: date_from
ParamInvoiceAdjustmentsDateFrom.description: to get invoice adjustments submitted on or after given start date (inclusive)

ParamInvoiceAdjustmentsDateTo.name: date_to
ParamInvoiceAdjustmentsDateTo.description: to get invoice adjustments submitted before given end date (excludes records submitted on this date)

ParamInvoiceAdjustmentsLimit.name: limit
ParamInvoiceAdjustmentsLimit.description: Return a page of results with given number of records; NOTE: technically ALL query parameters are strings or array of strings

ParamInvoiceAdjustmentsOffset.name: offset
ParamInvoiceAdjustmentsOffset.description: Return a page of results after given index of row; NOTE: technically ALL query parameters are strings or array of strings

ParamInvoiceAdjustmentId.name: invoice_adjustment_id
ParamInvoiceAdjustmentId.description: ID of an existing invoice adjustment

ParamInvoiceAdjustmentDeletionReason.name: reason
ParamInvoiceAdjustmentDeletionReason.description: Reason for deleting an existing invoice adjustment

ParamJobTitleListLimit.name: limit
ParamJobTitleListLimit.description: Return a page of results with given number of records; NOTE: technically ALL query parameters are strings or array of strings

ParamJobTitleListCursor.name: after_cursor
ParamJobTitleListCursor.description: Return next page of results after given cursor

ParamSeniorityListLimit.name: limit
ParamSeniorityListLimit.description: Return a page of results with given number of records; NOTE: technically ALL query parameters are strings or array of strings

ParamOffCyclePaymentId.name: offcycle_payment_id
ParamOffCyclePaymentId.description: ID of off-cycle payment to return

ParamLimitForAgreements.name: limit
ParamLimitForAgreements.description: Maximum number of records to return.

ParamOffsetForAgreements.name: offset
ParamOffsetForAgreements.description: Offset/index of record for the next page of records to return.

ParamPremiumDeletionReason.name: reason
ParamPremiumDeletionReason.description: Reason for deleting an existing Deel Premium from a contract.

ParamEndDate.name: end_date
ParamEndDate.description: The day to end the contract.

ParamFinalPaymentWorkweekStart.name: workweek_start
ParamFinalPaymentWorkweekStart.description: The day the work week starts, 0 to 6

ParamFinalPaymentWorkweekEnd.name: workweek_end
ParamFinalPaymentWorkweekEnd.description: The day the work week ends, 0 to 6

ParamLegalEntityQuery.name: entities
ParamLegalEntityQuery.description: Filter by legal entity type; company, or individual

isVerified.title: True if email has been verified

method.description: The HTTP method of the failed request

url.description: The relative URL of the failed request

status.description: The status code of the response

api_req_id.description: The request ID of the failed request

docs.description: A link to the official documentation for the requested endpoint resource

source.description: The source handler which produced the returned error

code.description: The code of the source handler which produced the returned error

message.description: A description of the returned error

path.description: The JSON path where input validation failed

external_id.description: Filter contracts for given external ID

DateStringDefaultNow.description: Short date in format ISO-8601 (YYYY-MM-DD). For example: 2022-12-31. Defaults to current date

DateStringRequired.description: Short date in format ISO-8601 (YYYY-MM-DD). For example: 2022-12-31.

DateString.description: Short date in format ISO-8601 (YYYY-MM-DD). For example: 2022-12-31.

client_signature.description: normally name of client is used as signature

ContractDetailsToAmend.description: You can specify any combination of data points that need changing.

pay_before_weekends.description: If the payment due is on a weekend, pay on Friday.

job_title_name.description: You can enter new job title.

job_title_id.description: If you want to use a predefined job title, please use a job title ID

seniority_id.description: You can use a predefined seniority level ID.

special_clause.description: Text to describe any special clause in contract.

scope_of_work.description: Text to describe the scope of work of the contract.

state_code.description: The state or province code. Use country lookup endpoint to retrieve state codes.

scope_of_work.description: Describe the work to be performed.

special_clause.description: Enter any special clause you may have.

legal_entity.description: Choose the Deel legal entity for this contract. Use legal entity endpoint to retrieve a list of legal entities in your organization.

team.description: Choose the Deel team for this contract. Use teams endpoint to retrieve a list of teams in your organization.

job_title.description: Worker's job title. You can enter a custom job title or use a pre-defiled job title using the Id retrieved in job-titles endpoint.

id.description: Id of an predefined job title.

name.description: Job title. Please leave it blank when entering an Id.

seniority.description: Job seniority level. Please use the seniority levels endpoint to retrieve the list of seniority levels.

MetaDataOfContractToCreate.description: Additional custom info about a contract

documents_required.description: Require the contractor to upload necessary compliance documents as per their countrys labor laws.

amount.description: Amount to be paid. This field can be excluded when creating a Pay-as-you-go task-based or Milestone contracts.

pay_before_weekends.description: If the payment due is on a weekend, pay on Friday.

contract_template_id.description: Please use null to use default Deel contract template; otherwise you can use the template you created and customized. If template ID is not in payload, template stays unchanged.

WorkStatementScaleEnumOptional.description: Defines the scale at which the amount is paid. For example, enter 'hourly' to define the amount per hour. This field can be excluded when creating a Pay-as-you-go task-based or Milestone contracts.

WorkStatementScaleEnum.description: Defines the scale at which the amount is paid. For example, enter 'hourly' to define the amount per hour. This field can be excluded when creating a Pay-as-you-go task-based or Milestone contracts.

WorkStatementCycleEndTypeEnum.description: Cycle end can be weekly 1-7 (Monday = 1) or monthly 1-31.

WorkStatementPaymentDueTypeEnum.description: Type of payment due. If the payment is due on the last day of month, enter 'WITHIN_MONTH'.

total_amount.description: is equal to quantity times rate of active work statement + bonus in this record

TimesheetSharedProperties.description: Details of timesheet to create; a client, contractor or EOR may create a timesheet

quantity.description: this is based on the scale of work statement of contract agreed e.g. 2 weeks

TimesheetToUpdate.description: Details of timesheet to create; a client, contractor or EOR may update a timesheet

items.description: ID of an existing timesheet record

InvoiceAdjustmentToCreate.description: Details of invoice adjustment to create.

amount.description: Amount to be paid. Must be a positive number.

paymentCycleId.description: ID of an existing active payment cycle - required if type is "vat"

items.description: ID of an existing timesheet record

ContractStatusEnum.description: Status of a contract in Deel workflow

ContractFirstSignEnum.description: Flag to indicate who is supposed to sign a contract

visa_support.description: Identifies if Deel provides visa support for employees being hired in this country.

eor_support.description: Identifies if Deel support EoR in this country.

state_type.description: Identifies the type of sub-territory within a country where local laws may apply. Some countries may have states, provinces, prefectures or regions.

StateOfCountry.description: It may be called states, provinces, prefectures or regions, or none at all

InvoiceStatusEnumList.description: filter invoices by current status, show a invoice if its status is in this list

cursor.description: Use for pagination to get next set of records after the given cursor.

id.description: Unique identifier for the job title in Deel platform.

description.description: Description of the off-cycle payment entry.

filename.description: Original filename you used to upload using attachments end-point.

key.description: You can call attachments end-point, get key and URL to upload your file.

FileObject.description: This is the file you will upload in a multi-part form.

file.description: Upload the file you want to attach to this entry.

FileRefTypeEnum.description: type of files allowed when uploading attachments

external_id.description: A unique identifier for the object provided by an external system.

AgreementsSearchForm.description: Convenient model to encapsulate query parameters to get a list of agreements.

AgreementsParamLimit.description: Maximum number of records to return. This is supposed to be an integer but query parameters are string. Maximum is 50.

AgreementsParamOffset.description: Offset/index of record for the next page of records to return. This is supposed to be an integer but query parameters are string.

agreement_reflects_relation.description: Is the Contractor Agreement selected on the Deel Platform perfectly reflecting your organizations relation and actual working practices with the contractor?

contractor_characteristics.description: Workers doing certain jobs may be considered to be employees by law, even if they would otherwise be considered independent contractors under common law. Is the work of this worker characterized as: Apprentice, Trainee, Labourer, Driver, Medical worker, Legal worker, Construction worker or someone working in the fields of Finance/Investment?

remaining_days.description: Dais remaining to end the contract.

calculation_type.description: Either works days or calendar days

workweek_start.description: The day the work week starts, 0 to 6

workweek_end.description: The day the work week starts, 0 to 6

description.description: Get indemnity against tax authority penalties, liabilities and fines.
Get indemnity against third parties up to $10k depending on the court's decision.

EorEntitlementListItem.description: Entitlement Item for a given year.

vacation_requested.description: Vacation days requested by the employee.

vacation_used.description: Vacation days used by the employee.

vacation_total.description: Total number of vacation days requested, approved and used.

sick_leave_requested.description: Sick days requested by the employee.

sick_leave_used.description: Sick days used by the employee.

sick_leave_total.description: Total number of sick days requested, approved and used.

other_leave_requested.description: Other type of time off requested by the employee.

other_leave_approved.description: Other type of time off days approved.

other_leave_used.description: Other type of time off days used by the employee.

other_leave_total.description: Total number of other type of time off days requested, approved and used.

completion_date.description: Date the contract is marked for completion

id.description: Unique identifier of a contract template

NoticePeriod.description: Days before to notice the termination of contract for eather party.

ContractCustomField.description: Customized attributes on contracts (Employee ID, Project code, etc).

state.description: State code of the state/province where the this person will be employed.

type.description: Is it a full-time contract or a part-time contract?

work_visa_required.description: Do you require Deel to apply for work visa for this person?

time_off_type.description: If you want to use standard number of holidays for this employee, choose "STANDARD". If you want to enter a specific number of holidays, choose "SPECIFIC" and enter the number of days in the holidays field.

holidays.description: Enter the number of holidays. Leave this field blank if you are chooseing "STANDARD" time_off_type.

id.description: Enter the Id retrieved from the seniority lookup endpoint. Enter 34 for "Not Applicable".
Enter the Id of legal entity under which you want to hire this person. Use /legal-entities endpoint to retrieve a list of legal entities in your organization.
Enter the Id of team this person will be hired in. Use /teams endpoint to retrieve a list of teams in your organization.

variable_compensation.description: Varable compensation. For example, if the person will earn 5% of the gross annual salary as the variable compensation, enter 5.

variable_compensation_type.description: Should be set only if variable_compensation is set. It can be PERCENTAGE or FIXED.

quote_additional_fields.description: Some countries require additional employee information for employment contracts.

health_plan_id.description: Healthare plan Id. You can see available healthcare plans in the country guide endpoint.

id.description: Id of the contract quote created

scope_of_work.example: A designer works on the entire process of defining requirements, visualizing and creating graphics including illustrations or logos. Also, the designer works on shaping the visual aspects of websites, product packaging, and more.

state.description: State code of the state/province where the this person will be employed.

work_visa_required.description: Do you require Deel to apply for work visa for this person?

time_off_type.description: If you want to use standard number of holidays for this employee, choose "STANDARD". If you want to enter a specific number of holidays, choose "SPECIFIC" and enter the number of days in the holidays field.

calculated_holidays.description: Number of calculate holidays for this contract.

holiday.description: Range of the number of holidays.

min.description: Minimum number of holidays required for a legally compliant contract.

part_time_holiday.description: Holiday type and range for part-time contracts.

min.description: Minimum number of holidays required for a legally compliant contract.
Minimum number of sick days required for a legally compliant contract.

max.description: Maximum number of sick days allowed for a legally compliant contract.

min.description: Minimum wage for a legally compliant contract.

max.description: Maximum wage allowed for a legally compliant contract.

min.description: Minimum probation days required for a legally compliant contract.

max.description: Maximum probation days allowed for a legally compliant contract.

part_time_probation.description: Probation period range for part-time contracts.

min.description: Minimum probation days required for a legally compliant contract.

max.description: Maximum probation days allowed for a legally compliant contract.

work_schedule.description: Employee's Work schedule in days and hours.

start_date_buffer.description: Calculate employee's minimum start date using the start date buffer. Today's date + (number of business days x start_date_buffer) = Minimum start date.

adjustments_information_box.example: Not allowed to contract people under 21.

name.example: United Healthcare VSP Vision & Delta Dental: Singles Only

vacations.description: List of employee vacation time offs.

sick_leaves.description: List of employee sick leave time offs.

others.description: List of all other employee time offs.

yearly_limit.description: Total number of days off allowed per year.

over_annual_limit.description: Too many days off requested by employee.

yearly_requests.description: Total number of time off requests this year.

can_request_changes.description: Indicates if it is possible to make changes to the time off request.

is_updated.description: If true, an update to the original time off request was made.

change_request.description: Only valid if the requester asks to change existing time off and it has been reviewed.

applied_changes.description: List of changes applied to the time off.

requested_at.description: Timestamp when time off was requested.

reviewed_at.description: Timestamp when time off was reviewed.

denial_reason.description: Reason why time off was denied.

has_multiple_dates.description: Indicates if multiple time off days are requested.

status.description: Status of the time off request.

other_timeoff_name.description: Custom title for the time off. Only specify if type is "OTHER".
other_timeoff_name.example: This is time off for a doctor's appointment

requester.description: Employee who requested the time off.

reviewer.description: User who reviewed the time off.

days_used_start_year.description: Days used at the start year.

days_used_end_year.description: Days used at the end year.

total_days_used.description: Total number of time off days used.

start_date_is_half_day.description: Indicates if the first day of time off is a half day.

end_date_is_half_day.description: Indicates if the last day of time off is a half day.

date_is_half_day.description: If true, only a single date was specified.

TimeoffsAttachments.description: A list of attachments. 2022-09-08 FE only allows for "SICK LEAVE"

TimeoffsAttachmentsItem.description: A item in attachments array. 2022-09-08 FE only allows for "SICK LEAVE"

id.description: Unique identifier of a Deel contract.

is_employee.description: Only valid for requester. True if requester is an employee.

is_approved.description: Approve or decline employee's time off request.

start_date.description: Start date of employee's time off.

end_date.description: End date of employee's time off.

with_multiple_dates.description: If true, then multiple time off days were requested. You must supply a start and end date. If false, end date is ignored

is_start_date_half_day.description: Is the start day a half day?

is_end_date_half_day.description: Is the start day a half day?

other_timeoff_name.description: Custom name for this time off.

signing_key.description: The webhook's signing key, used to generate webhook signatures.

events.description: The list of events to enable for this subscription.

created_at.description: Time at which the webhook was created.

updated_at.description: Time at which the webhook was updated.

hidden.description: Property to hide the webhook from frontend view. Commonly by Dell 3rd party apps

total.description: Total invoice amount including Fee and VAT.

is_offcycle.description: Indicates if the invoice related to an offcycle payment.

contract_oid.description: The Hris Direct employee contract ID

id.description: The unique identifier for the client legal entity.

name.description: The name of the client legal entity.

scale.description: The payment scale (e.g., hourly, weekly, monthly, etc.)

currency.description: The currency code (ISO 4217) for the payment

contract_name.description: The name of the contract associated with the payment

seniority.description: The seniority level associated with the employment.

hiring_type.description: The hiring type associated with the employment.

hiring_status.description: The hiring status associated with the employment.

completion_date.description: The completion date of the employment.

contract_status.description: The contract status associated with the employment.

voluntarily_left.description: Indicates whether the employment was left voluntarily.

client_legal_entity.description: The client legal entity associated with the employment.

has_eor_termination.description: Indicates whether the employment had an EOR termination.

contract_is_archived.description: Indicates whether the employment's contract is archived.

id.description: The unique identifier for the team.

work_email.description: Work email address of the user

personal_email.description: Personal email address of the user

country_name.description: Name of the country where the user is located

birth_date.description: Date of birth of the user in ISO format (yyyy-mm-dd)

start_date.description: Date when the user started their current employment in ISO format (yyyy-mm-dd)

payments.description: List of payment objects representing the user's payment history

seniority.description: Seniority level of the user's role

direct_manager.description: Name of the user's direct manager

PublicId.description: The public UUID of the object

deelToken.description:
## Authentication

Deel API uses API tokens to authenticate requests. A bearer token is required to authenticate all API requests.

All API requests must be made over HTTPS. Calls made over plain HTTP will fail. API requests without authentication will also fail.

```
curl -X GET 'api.letsdeel.com/rest/v1/contracts' \
-H 'Authorization: Bearer YOUR-TOKEN-HERE'
```

### Generating Access Tokens
1. Navigate to **Apps & Perks > Developer Center**.
2. Click on the Generate New Token button.
3. In the popup, click Generate Token button to generate a new token. Your newly generated token is visible on the screen.
4. Make sure to copy and save your token once is generated. You won't be able to see it again!

![image](developers.png)

oauth2.description: Standard OAuth2 security scheme based on https://swagger.io/docs/specification/authentication/

scopes.accounting:read: View payments and invoices in your organization.
scopes.accounting:write: Create and edit payments and invoices.
scopes.invoice-adjustments:write: Create, edit, review, and delete invoice adjustments.
scopes.milestones:write: Create, edit, review, and delete milestones.
scopes.organizations:read: View basic information about your organizations, teams, legal entities and agreements.
scopes.off-cycle-payments:write: Create, edit, review your off-cycle payments.
scopes.timesheets:read: View work submitted for time-based contracts.
scopes.timesheets:write: Create, edit, review, and delete timesheets.
scopes.tasks:write: Create, edit, review and delete your pay-as-you-go tasks.
